name: Long Barrel Curling Iron 1.25' NanoIonic MX
about: What it is:A curling iron that keeps hair hydrated, even with continuous use, and leaves it looking and feeling irresistibly silky and smooth..Hair Type:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Texture:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Curl-Enhancing.Key Benefits:- Longer barrel for styling ease.What Else You Need to Know:The extended-length barrel creates loose, modern curls and waves, making styling easier. The combination of Nanolonic MX and Bio Ionic Moisturizing Heat‚Ñ¢ locks in moisture, seals the cuticle, and ensures curls last and stay conditioned and bouncy instead of dull and limp. This product includes a one-year warranty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs amazing I use it every day and my hair is still healthy 10/10 definitely recommend I was kind of thrown off by the price but I splurged and bought it BTW, I don‚Äôt regret any of it Ôøº

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure what all the negative reviews are, I‚Äôm thinking user error. If you are looking for a tighter curl the 1inch barrel is your girl! But if you‚Äôre looking for some loose curls this curling iron is the one! This curler gives blowout looking hair just make sure to use hairspray to set it!  favorites too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My curls didn't last for more than an hour with this. This was my first expensive curling tool purchase and I was strongly disappointed with it. I tried everything and nothing worked. The long barrel was a plus but not worth it if they don't hold anyways.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought this curling iron a few weeks ago. I loved the design and the long barrel. It cut the curling time HOWEVER the curls fell within 20 minutes. I tried it several times because I really wanted it to work. I even did it on max heat and left it longer but the curls never stayed. It was a complete disappointment! I have never had this issue before with any curler before, even much cheaper ones worked. Beware of the BioIonic website as it only posts positive reviews but if you read other platforms, you will see that this is a huge problem for many. It was a complete waste of money, I do not recommend it!

reviews.review_title: Hated this curling iron; and I had such high hopes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this when my GHD curling iron overheated for some reason and died. It is a terrible curling iron. Normally after curling my hair with the GHD the curls would last for DAYS. With this, they were gone within hours. It wasn't cheap so I used it many times over several months. I actually left it in Sweden because it wasn't worth going back to the hotel to retrieve it. I purchased another GHD when I got home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this iron. It‚Äôs easy to use, but the curls disappear very quickly. Definitely for more of a wave.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Waste of money for sure, it‚Äôs nice that it doesn‚Äôt hold the hair too tight it‚Äôs easy to work with but man it doesn‚Äôt hold a curl at all. I don‚Äôt really get the science on why this won‚Äôt but my hair holds a curl but this doesn‚Äôt at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this for its long barrel, smooth curls, ease of use, end cap you can grab while iron is hot, ability to lock temp, long cord, fast heating time, and its light weight. The curls last for days and my hair is long to my waist

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After 3 time uses the set of the temperature don‚Äôt work

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot find a way to make my curls stay. They fall out immediately, I‚Äôve tried with products, without products, different combinations of products and nope, they do not stay whatsoever. I was gifted the Dyson air wrap which I LOVE so this has been sitting in my closet, collecting dust.

reviews.review_title: For $150 there should be no issues.
reviews.review_text: Broke within the first month of use. The buttons to adjust and set the temperature don‚Äôt work. That should not happen for $150 curling ironing. Returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don‚Äôt know where these negative reviews are coming from this is truly the best curling iron I‚Äôve ever used!! Even if your hair isn‚Äôt super long, the long barrel makes it so much easier to use! Heats up quick and curls great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I cant believe I wasted $150 on this. It does not hold curl. It takes longer than ever to curl my hair bc I have to recurl all the curls that fell out on one side while curling the other side. Ive tried texture spray and hair spray and turning the temperature on the iron up and nothing works. Bc of Sephora‚Äôs crappy return policy of 30 days from date of purchase, not date of arrival, I am outside the window to return. My husband ordered it as a gift during  the sale and it took 2 weeks to arrive. Then when he gave it to me, I only had a couple days to try it. I was expecting to love it and did not rush to use it and now I wish I had. It took me a few days of using it to realize how awful it was and I‚Äôm stuck with it now. Do not waste your money. I will go back to using my broken T3 bc it is faster and holds curl so much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love a lot of things about the design of this curling iron.  But I have curled my hair daily for the last 5 years at least with a hot tools model.  I decided to get this and ever since my hair has stunk!! So I think has been burned but it

BEWARE OF SHIPPING TO A PARCEL LOCATION Sephora returned my order and customer service was confused about my delivery address to a Walgreens. Sephora offered it so??? Didn‚Äôt want to risky chances of it getting stolen at home, but my experience was worse. It never made it Walgreens, to me, and now it‚Äôs out of stock in town and where I‚Äôm going out of town this weekend. Worst of all, got it during Black Friday and Sephora only offered me the same deal for the next 3 days lol. Can‚Äôt ship it to me from wherever it‚Äôs in stock to make their mistake **that they BLAMED THE CARRIER** for right. Never shipping at Sephora again after I use my gift cards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I regret buying this. I have long hair that curls pretty well and this curling irons does not hold curls and my hair looks awful by the time I get to any event I curl my hair for. Conair curled so much better.

reviews.review_title: I use it everyday, great investment!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite curling iron!! I have 22in hair extensions and this is the only curling iron that does the job. It never snags my hair and has all the perfect temperatures so I don't fry my hair off lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Still purchased after reading sub par reviews hoping that my luck would be different. Not in love with it.  Curls do not hold even using it at the highest heat setting.  Will be going back to my GHD iron.

reviews.review_title: *Clamp was not tight enough, curls would not hold*
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This iron did not clamp the hair tight. I loved the long barrel, but it would just not hold the curl because of the loose clamp. Had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this a few times now and each time the curls just fall out completely. It's very disappointing. This has not happened with other hair tools at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love this extra long barrel. Adjustable settings, quickly heats, curls really well. That extra length makes all the difference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick hair and a lot of it. I‚Äôm not new to curling my hair and never in my life have I had issues holding curls. They usually stay for days- until now. Gonna return- this iron is not worth the $.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not only does this iron create curls that barely last and drop after 2 hours, it seriously makes your hair smell burnt after using. I only bought it because I liked how long the barrel is and makes doing my hair faster, but I always regret it when I use it because the curls look FLAT and smell BURNT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing curling iron. Glides through hair beautifully! Perfect for long hair. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The ideal of a long barrel is great; however, this particular curling iron catches the hair and it gets caught between the base of the barrel and the heating element. I do not recommend purchasing.

reviews.review_title: The BEST curling iron! A MUST HAVE!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this curling iron! My hair is very thin, with hair loss due to chemo. It‚Äôs shoulder length with absolutely no volume. Worth the expense!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! Super easy to use even for beginners, makes my hair really soft and a nice soft wave! Looooove !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Have had this iron about 6 months now and absolutely love it. My curls last 3 days min, I use it once a week on the lowest heat setting and my hair is still in great condition. Curls always come out soft and shiny, well worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to make this work but it won‚Äôt hold my curls. Love the long barrel but my curls fall out before I finish curling the other side of my head. Tried turning up the heat and my hair smelt burnt for weeks no matter how many times I showered. :‚Äô(

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love this curling iron
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this curling iron, as I heard so many great things about it, but it did not live up to the hype. No matter what I did, the curls do not stay. They fall out after about 20 min, look flat and like I barely styled my hair. I normally use a wand with no issues and curls that last for days, I will be going back to the wand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to love this. I do love the curls it produces but, as many others have said, the curls don‚Äôt hold (mine didn‚Äôt hold for more than an hour, unlike every other curling tool I‚Äôve used before, making it a big waste of time to carefully curl my hair with this tool). I tried it several different days and used different products with it but no dice on making the curls hold. It is going to be returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift for Christmas and I absolutely love it! Definitely worth the money! Super fast heating and easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair just can‚Äôt with these clampsüò≠ I was looking forward to this long barrel because of my long hair but my curls end up falling

reviews.review_title: A must have in my hair routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for the perfect long barrel curling iron for so long and this is the one!! It is so easy to use and creates flawless looking curls! It also doesn't give me the feeling like my hair is burning off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this but unfortunately does not hold a curl at all. I would not recommend anyone buy this.

reviews.review_title: Must have for long thick hair - Fast & effective!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am super lazy in doing my hair! I have long thick hair and love this tool. I usually buy curlers use them once and then they collect dust. This one because of the long barrel is great and easy for my length, it also allows me to take bigger chunks of hair making it faster. I only let my hair air dry and then used it and my hair was also super soft and not dry. I do use heat protectant spray.

reviews.review_title: must have for girls with long hair and no time!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this long barrel, makes curling my hair so much faster. The first time using it I suggest turning it on in your bathroom with the vent on because whatever coating comes on it smells very strong and made me feel nauseous. But it does go away after 5 mins of being on. The clamp is looser than what I'm used to but it's actually quite nice because it doesn't pull out any hair and my hair glides right through without having to pushing on the clamp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Never thought I could fall in love with a curling iron. I have very long thick hair. This curling iron holds my curls. IN LOVE üòç

reviews.review_title: The only curling iron I will ever need!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This iron blew me away. I can't believe I waited so long to get it. I keep my hair anywhere from middle of my chest to rib cage length, so I thought the longer barrel would be useful. When I tell you my curls/waves have NEVER looked better, I mean it!! I prefer wavier curls because I like to keep my length, but I never was able to master the twist and drop technique that's really popular right now. I decided to purchase this iron because I saw lots of hair dressers on TikTok using it. This iron achieves that twist and drop look without any effort on my part. I curl my hair like usual! Every curl is smooth and stays for days--and I have pin straight, hard to keep a curl, type hair. If this broke tomorrow, I would place an order immediately. I don't think it compares to any other hot tool out there.

reviews.review_title: WOW. Best curling iron I've ever used...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMG. Where has this thing been all of my life? I have seriously tried every hot tool under the sun, from the mermaid wave, to several hot tools curling irons, GHD, to the self spinning curling iron, etc. if they make it I bought it. No matter what I bought, or how I tried I could never achieve that effortless, beachy, soft, tossled wave, EVER! I plugged this in as soon as it was delivered, and I IMMEDIATELY got the results I have been to get for years. This iron is soooo easy to use, and your hair doesn't get pulled at all. It gets hot quickly, and the cool end tip makes it even more user friendly. I was able to style my hair in less than 10 minutes. I couldn't believe it. AND my hair looks super shiny and healthy afterwards. SO HAPPY I MADE THIS PURCHASE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product from my hairdresser 7 years ago and it still works perfectly. I have thick corse hair so my hair holds curl well in general, but this makes my hair look amazing for days. I‚Äôve had this for 7 years and never wanted to replace it with a different style product and I think that speaks for itself. I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this curling iron!! (I know I didn‚Äôt purchase this product from sephora but I was hoping to provide insight on the product)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Finally, a tool that I can use to easily make beachy curls!  Perfect if you have longer hair.  Time to ditch my other curling irons!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My daughter‚Äôs hair is all the way down to her back.  This extra long barrel was perfect for her super long hair.  The curls are beautiful.  Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to use and my curls always looks shiny when I use this iron. For as much money as this costs I shouldn‚Äôt have a problem with my curls falling within an hour and I never have that problem when I use any other hair tool.

reviews.review_title: An excellent upgrade from a mid-range curling iron
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to order this curling iron from some of the other reviews, but it's is actually sort of amazing! I have fine, thin hair and the barrel does a great job of producing thick and shiny curls. The iron glides quite nicely, so much so that I typically don't even have to unclamp to make adjustments. And the long barrel, well--you don't know what you're missing out on until you try it! If you're considering upgrading from a mid-level curling iron (I was using Hot Tools previously), this is definitely worth the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I've only been using this iron for a few weeks so I can't speak to the longevity of the product. However, what I can say is I am so impressed by my results so far! I have thick, coarse, medium-to-long hair and this makes it so smooth and soft. It glides effortlessly through my hair and my hair doesn't get snagged anywhere or create any unflattering crimps, because the clamp is not too tight and the texture of the plates are so silky. With the long barrel, it would be very hard to get tangles or have hair spill over the end as you curl. So it's very beginner friendly for someone who is not used to a standard curling iron with a clamp. For me personally, all it takes is for the iron to be heated to 390, a little medium hold hairspray to set, and these curls will last for days! Of course on the second day, it goes from a full curl to more of a soft wave.. but that soft wave looks great and lasts a full 3 days. Personally I wash my hair twice a week so I haven't really tested longer than that. I'm sure that as with any iron, results will depend on hair type, technique, and the products you use in conjunction with it. For me I'm very pleased. Overall, I was apprehensive about the price but as long as this iron holds up over time, I think it's a terrific investment.

I‚Äôm very conflicted about this iron. It‚Äôs so smooth and makes my hair very happy!! It‚Äôs also the perfect length for my long hair. However, the curls fallout within 12 hours (with or without hairspray). They definitely don‚Äôt last to the next day. But when I use cheaper curling irons, (same temperature) the curls will stay for at least 2 days with no touch ups and no hairspray. I just don‚Äôt like recurling my entire head of hair the second day because that‚Äôs so much heat on my hair in so little time:(

reviews.review_title: buy these from bio ionic website
reviews.review_text: Bought this and the 1 inch and they both stopped working after one use each, both defective purchased from Sephora. Can only return within 30 days of purchase and no mention of my credit during return issue process.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for a little while now and I love it. my hair is all the way down my back and I used to have to curl the top half of my hair and then the bottom half. The long barrel cut down the time by 50% and creates beautiful curls!

reviews.review_title: Works well, but base pulls out hairs
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love it as I need the long barrel for my long hair, but my hair gets caught in the base where the barrel meets the handle. Going to need to return unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The long barrel is so worth it for medium-long hair. Your hair slips through like silk.  It‚Äôs sleek, light weight, and has a rotating cord.
Love! Highly recommend. Smooth barrel but tight enough, and extra length is a game changes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it. It did a great job making my hair smooth and shiny. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So smooth and seamless! The clamp is not super tight, so you can easily pull the wand through your hair without any creasing. Heats up super quickly and makes your hair shiny. The long barrel is also awesome if you have even medium length hair. Definitely worth the price!!
